description:
DeFi Blockchain desktop app for Windows, Linux and Mac.

Use DeFi Wallet to interact with DeFiChain.
It is a wallet for $DFI, wrapped BTC, ETH, USDT.
Liquidity mine, use the DEX, create masternodes, and more.
What's Changed
Node update to v4.1.0 in #1303
:rocket: Features
- update(ci): workflow updates by @fullstackninja864 in #1301
- feature(release): enabled mac-x64-build by @fullstackninja864 in #1304
Full Changelog: https://github.com/BirthdayResearch/defichain-app/compare/v4.0.9...v4.1.0
